entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 19 except 11 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High 19 except 11 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Sunday 7 May 2023
